name: dasunnethsara/zenithphp
description: ZenithPHP is a lightweight PHP framework for MVC architecture, streamlining modern PHP web development.

post-create-project-cmd: php -r "\$envFile = '.env'; if (file_exists(\$envFile)) { \$content = file_get_contents(\$envFile); \$projectName = basename(getcwd()); \$content = preg_replace('/^APP_NAME=.*/m', 'APP_NAME=' . \$projectName, \$content); file_put_contents(\$envFile, \$content); echo 'Updated APP_NAME in .env file.'; }"
